clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of hormone receptor positive metastatic breast cancer in postmenopausal women with disease progression following anti estrogen therapy as monotherapy or in combination with other antineoplastic agents

contraindications.disease: There is no clinical experience with overdosage in humans
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Fulvestrant for intramuscular administration is an estrogen receptor antagonist without known agonist effects

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Fulvestrant
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Fulvestrant
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Fulvestrant
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol epoetin beta is combined with Fulvestrant
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Fulvestrant is combined with Ospemifene
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Desogestrel
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Zidovudine
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Lamotrigine
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Ethinylestradiol
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Testosterone propionate
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Nelfinavir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Phenytoin
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Ritonavir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Carbamazepine
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Efavirenz
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Primidone
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Tipranavir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Rifampicin
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be increased when combined with Phenobarbital
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Adenine
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Valproic acid
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Indomethacin
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Sorafenib
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Erlotinib
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Flurbiprofen
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Propofol
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Probenecid
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Gemfibrozil
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Flunitrazepam
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Deferasirox
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Eltrombopag
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Pazopanib
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Regorafenib
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Dasabuvir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Sodium aurothiomalate
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Ombitasvir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Paritaprevir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Silibinin
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Ertugliflozin
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Dacomitinib
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Fostamatinib
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Rucaparib
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Enasidenib
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Pibrentasvir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Glecaprevir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Pexidartinib
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Indinavir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Amitriptyline
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Ketoconazole
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Atazanavir
The metabolism of Fulvestrant can be decreased when combined with Nilotinib
Fulvestrant may decrease effectiveness of Fluoroestradiol F 18 as a diagnostic agent
